ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Tambourine
ygData.msgSnippet: I never hunted Dalnir was too high - but (on Xegony at the time at least) - it was a heavily camped zoned - and those were a common drop - so a simple trip to
ygData.messageBody:
I never hunted Dalnir was too high - but (on Xegony at the time at least) -
it was a heavily camped zoned - and those were a common drop - so a simple
trip to zone and a shot and I got it and was on my merry way.

Kaesoria is a rarely camped zone - so I had to put a group together. The
problem is its an ultra-random drop. Some people get theirs after clearing
the area once - others have had to spend two evenings to get the mob. You
need a good mob - and will have to fight your way down. At your level it
won't be easy - but will be fun and get you some XP (I was in my mid-upper
40's IIRC)

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Katye and Brandon [mailto:landmax13@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 06, 2002 12:34 AM
To: Bard List
Subject: [eqbards] Tambourine

Got my 4th coin for the tambourine quest today in Emerald jungle.

Two coins left... the kaesora coin and the dalnir coin.

I'd appreciate any stories/remembrances from anyone getting these
coins. Looks like I need 40 - 45 lvl group to get either, but how much
luck have people had by just shouting from zone in either place?

any info appreciated. Really looking forward to that tambourine

Raub
37 E. Marr server
